Description:
Detects execution of Windows Problem Steps Recorder (psr.exe), a utility used to record the user screen and clicks.

Author: Beyu Denis, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Screen Capture Activity Via Psr.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\psr.exe' and (command like '%/start%' or command like '%-start%')
